item.title: Report E-2024120457
item.description:
Report E-2024120457

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-04
  • City: MARSHFIELD
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 07:43 EST, ERTS was contacted by XPO Logistics (XSJ) about a cargo release. It was reported that due to a loose cap, approximately 1 ounce of Gasoline (hazardous - UN1203) was released onto the top area. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the top of the drum and did not impact the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product was cleaned with rags and placed into a 5-gallon poly drum with no free liquid and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
